parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Object </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets orientation of 3D control model. It is similar to [[setVectorDirAndUp]] command for an object.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetModelDirAndUp''' [dir, up] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]] - 3D control  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [dir, up] : [[Array]] - format [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> dir : [[Array]] - [[vectorDir]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> up : [[Array]] - [[vectorUp]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl3D [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]] [[0,1,0],[0,0,1]]; //default orientation</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[vectorDir]], [[vectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
